name: Dimension Thief
description:
Hello to all of you!

I present you "Dimension thief", a VR puzzle game for 2 players.

The main constraint of this project was to take a scene created by Brassart's 3D students, in a 19th century London style, and turn it into a puzzle game for an investigation.

The first player uses the VR headset to describe what is happening in the scene, so that the second player can help him/her solve the riddles with the document (game and document to download).

Here is the result of two long weeks of intensive work!

Don't hesitate to give feedback :)

Pitch : 

The players play as two thieves. During an old break, they found a top-secret document that explains how to find a treasure in the shadow dimension. The machine that can change the dimensions is in an apartment in London. The thieves decide to go there and find the treasure. The first one goes there while the second decides to give him indications. Once there, they rise to the last floor of the house indicated on the document and discover a room out of the common. This room was made by an creator who wanted travel in the dimensions, but disappeared but no one knew how. The thieves searched how it works and how to go in the dimension where the treasure is located.

Game designer : Roxane Jacquot

Developers : Cédric Lecullié and Roxane Jacquot

3D artits : Charles Lardenois, Loïc Noailhat, Sofien Jacquet, Camille Tessier, Yann Del Castillo, Audrey Comparin, Salomé Brunet, Clothilde Hugon
